file_insights.test_coverage: High - Comprehensive test suite covering CRUD operations, edge cases, and validation

patterns_discovered: Thorough test design with multiple test cases per function
Use of table-driven and sub-test patterns in Go testing
Rigorous validation of state changes and object properties
Defensive programming in store methods (handling nil/empty cases)
gotchas_discovered: Deep copy requirements when retrieving store items
Need to handle nil slices/maps in conversation objects
Importance of timestamp tracking during object updates
Edge cases like empty names and manual object creation
recommendations: Maintain comprehensive test coverage across all CRUD operations
Continue using sub-test approach for granular test scenarios
Implement additional mutation tests to verify immutability
Consider property-based testing for more exhaustive validation
